newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egyptian pound averages 3.3946/3.3967 to dlr.
newsitem.headline: Egyptian pound averages 3.3946/3.3967 to dlr.

text.p: Private-sector Egyptian banks said the dollar ranged from 3.3910 to 3.3960 bid and 3.3950 to 3.3980 offered on Monday in the interbank market.
A survey of five actively trading banks gave average rates of 3.3946 pounds bid and 3.3967 offered. The averages compared with 3.3938 pounds bid and 3.3966 offered on Sunday.
The Central Bank calculated the average exchange rate at midday (1000 GMT) as 3.394943 buy and 3.398550 sell.
